name: Speed Dating Fantasy
description:
Peruse 100 local single (monsters) in your area - can you see through to the AI prompts that generated them, to win over their hearts?

A rough-and-ugly and overly simplified speed dating sim with hints of Undertale and heaps of AI.

Created in 48 hours for the Game Jame Ludum Dare #51.

As with all my jam games, it is rough and ugly - but I hope it makes you smile. Thanks!
